When installing restful_authentication, you run this command:

<filter:jscode> patrick$: script/generate authenticated user sessions --include-activation </filter:jscode>

And get this error.

<filter:jscode> invalid option: --include-activation </filter:jscode>

What's wrong with this picture? Remove acts_as_authenticated. You can't use both plugins at the same time.

Dumb, but I'm sure I won't be the only one.
